sub_title: Junior Diplomat at the Czech MFA with previous experience in public affairs, diplomacy, security, and defence.
summary: Graduate of the Advanced MSc. Program in International Relations and Diplomacy from Leiden University and The Clingendael Institute, focusing on European security, counter-terrorism, and defence diplomacy. Previous experience in both private and the public field. Strong belief in multidisciplinary approach to work. Currently seeking opportunities in the public service domain, primarily focusing on the area of defence and security. I enjoy working in a dynamic, multicultural environment, while being regularly challenged.

volunteer_experiences: [{'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'role': 'Freiwilliger im Bildungsbereich', 'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'AFS Intercultural Programs', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4D0BAQE7K1rsMVR8JA/company-logo_400_400/0/1688379383033?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=cp14RZ7Nkr8vbR8TUh2W3qh53YZ2NMCOsdlDQISWbJM', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/afs-intercultural-programs/'}, 'cause': 'EDUCATION', 'description': 'In 2012, I participated on an exchange program to Austria with AFS. My main task was helping to set up Welcome and Mid-Term Camps, where we welcomed arriving students from all across the world. During these 7 days camps, we worked with the pupils on advancing their interpersonal and development skills. We also made sure they are doing well while staying in the designated country and everything runs smoothly. For each semester, I was assigned to 3-5 pupils as a tutor, helping them with their day-to-day problems or any struggles, that might have occurred throughout the stay.'}, {'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'role': 'Referent', 'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Do Rakouska na zkušenou', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQG9gR6z9eb65A/company-logo_400_400/0/1519939028273?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=eCC_qfNWZmXdPolGHqfJdN_xSPM-l63UNUCz5Vu2hKE', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/do-rakouska-na-zkusenou/'}, 'cause': 'EDUCATION', 'description': 'Project "Do Rakouska an Zkušenou" is a non-profit student organisation which has as a goal to promote\nAustria as country, where young individuals (predominantly from Czechia) can gain excellent practical and study experience.
